subject: VENUES GET: PASSED ✅ - 4 of 5 GETs Complete!
body:
Team,

## Venues GET Re-validation: PASSED!

Fulton's fix is live. masteredCityId now returns populated object.

## Updated Status - 4 of 5 GETs PASSED!

| Endpoint | Status |
|----------|--------|
| Categories GET | ✅ PASSED |
| Roles GET | ✅ PASSED |
| Organizers GET | ✅ PASSED (ALFA) |
| Venues GET | ✅ PASSED |
| Events GET | ⏳ PENDING |

## Remaining: Events GET

Ben - Fulton needs your specs:
1. What date field does Express filter on?
2. What is the default date range?
3. What query params for date filtering?

Once Ben provides specs and Fulton implements, we'll have 5/5!

- Sarah
